jobDescription: Come join the leadership team building content for one of the worlds largest e-commerce and travel sites!  We are looking for an experienced manager ready to take the next step; someone energetic and analytical, with a proven track record of driving business results with superior content delivered by operational excellence. Someone ready and able to help build content teams for Agoda, one of the worlds most successful online travel companies.  As Associate Director, Content Operations, you will analyze customer and product data to determine content value and priority; set content strategy and KPIs that drive value; build and manage content teams; work with product owners and IT on A/B experiments and reporting; and coordinate with accommodation supply and connectivity teams. Via rigorous data analysis and A/B experiments, you will identify content opportunities that drive customer value, bookings and conversion, build business cases around the opportunity and get buy-in from partners, senior management and 3rd party suppliers, and lead teams in execution in a fast-paced, dynamic work environment. This is a full-time position based in Bangkok, Thailand, reporting to the Director of Content Operations.
